Element.Name: UBL VersionID
Element.Description: Identifies the UBL version on which the transaction instance is based.

Element.Name: Customization identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the specification of content and rules that apply to the transaction.

Element.Name: Profile identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the BII profile or business process context in which the transaction appears.

Element.Name: Document identifier
Element.Description: An transaction instance must contain an identifier. The identifier enables positive referencing the document instance for various purposes including referencing between transactions that are part of the same process.

Element.Name: Despatch advice issue date
Element.Description: The date when the despatch advice is issued.

Element.Name: Despatch advice issue time
Element.Description: The time when the despatch advice is issued.

Element.Name: Despatch note
Element.Description: A textual note for the despatch as whole.

Element.Name: Order Reference
Element.Description: Reference to the order on which the despatch advice is based.

Element.Name: Order reference
Element.Description: Used to provide a reference to the buyers order on which the despatch is based.

Element.Name: Despatching party
Element.Description: Party who creates the despatch advice on behalf of the seller and is responsible for the physical shipment.

Element.Name: Sender
Element.Description: Information regarding the sender.

Element.Name: Electronic address identifier
Element.Description: A despatch advice may contain the despatching party electronic address identifier. The address can be of any format and the format should be identified in the message.

Element.Name: Identification
Element.Description: Sender identification

Element.Name: Despatching party identifier
Element.Description: The identifier of the despatching party.

Element.Name: Name
Element.Description: Sender name

Element.Name: Despatching party name
Element.Description: The name of the despatching party.

Element.Name: Contact
Element.Description: Contact information regarding sender.

Element.Name: Contact person name
Element.Description: The name of the contact person.

Element.Name: Contact telephone number
Element.Description: A phone number for the contact person. If the person has a direct number, this is that number.

Element.Name: A fax number for the contact persons.
Element.Description: A fax number for the contact persons

Element.Name: Contact email address
Element.Description: The e-mail address for the contact person. If the person has a direct e-mail this is that email.

Element.Name: Receiver
Element.Description: Receiver of the despatch advice on behalf of the buyer. Responsible for the physical reception and approval of the goods.

Element.Name: Receiver
Element.Description: Information regarding the receiver.

Element.Name: Consignee party identifier
Element.Description: A despatch advice may contain the despatching party electronic address identifier. The address can be of any format and the format should be identified in the message.

Element.Name: Identification
Element.Description: Receiver identification

Element.Name: Consignee party identifier
Element.Description: The receiving party identifier.

Element.Name: Name
Element.Description: Receiver name

Element.Name: Consignee party name
Element.Description: The name pf the receiving party.

Element.Name: Address
Element.Description: The address to where the goods is shipped.

Element.Name: Consignee party address identifier
Element.Description: An identifier for a specific address within a scheme of registered addresses. Identifying the addess to where the items have been despatched

Element.Name: Address line 1
Element.Description: The main address line in a postal address usually the street name and number.

Element.Name: Address line 2
Element.Description: An additional address line in a postal address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line. Common use are secondary house number in a complex or in a building.

Element.Name: City
Element.Description: The common name of the city where the postal address is. The name is written in full rather than as a code.

Element.Name: Post Code
Element.Description: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant national postal service, such as a ZIP code or Post Code.

Element.Name: Country subentity
Element.Description: For specifying a region, county, state, province etc. within a country by using text.

Element.Name: Country
Element.Description: Country code

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: The country where the address is. The country should always be given by using ISO code 3166 alpha 2.

Element.Name: Contact
Element.Description: Contact information regarding the receiver.

Element.Name: Contacting details
Element.Description: The name of the contact person.

Element.Name: Contact telephone number
Element.Description: A phone number for the contact person. If the person has a direct number, this is that number.

Element.Name: Contact fax number
Element.Description: A fax number for the contact persons

Element.Name: Contact email address
Element.Description: The e-mail address for the contact person. If the person has a direct e-mail this is that email.

Element.Name: Buyer
Element.Description: Information regarding the buyer who is commercially responsible for the goods in the despatch advice.

Element.Name: Buyer
Element.Description: Information regarding the buyer.

Element.Name: Identification
Element.Description: Buyer identification

Element.Name: Buyer party identifier
Element.Description: The buying party identifier

Element.Name: Name
Element.Description: Buyer name

Element.Name: Buying party name
Element.Description: The name of the buying party.

Element.Name: Seller
Element.Description: Information regarding the seller.

Element.Name: Sender
Element.Description: Seller information

Element.Name: Identification
Element.Description: Seller identification

Element.Name: Selling party identifier
Element.Description: An identifier for the seller party.

Element.Name: Name
Element.Description: Seller name

Element.Name: Seller party name
Element.Description: The seller party name.

Element.Name: Contact
Element.Description: Contact information regarding sender.

Element.Name: Contact person name
Element.Description: The name of the contact person.

Element.Name: Contact telephone number
Element.Description: A phone number for the contact person. If the person has a direct number, this is that number.

Element.Name: Contact fax number
Element.Description: A fax number for the contact persons

Element.Name: Contact email address
Element.Description: The e-mail address for the contact person. If the person has a direct e-mail this is that email.

Element.Name: Originator
Element.Description: Information regarding the originator of the purchase order in the buyers organisation.

Element.Name: Originator
Element.Description: Originator information

Element.Name: Identification
Element.Description: Originator identification

Element.Name: Originating party identifier
Element.Description: The originator party identifier

Element.Name: Name
Element.Description: Originator name

Element.Name: Originating party name
Element.Description: The originator party name.

Element.Name: Shipment
Element.Description: Shipment information

Element.Name: Shipment identifier
Element.Description: Identifies a shipment.

Element.Name: Shipment description
Element.Description: Free-form text applying to a shipment. This element may contain notes or any other similar information that is not contained explicitly in another structure.

Element.Name: Shipment gross weight
Element.Description: The total weight of the shipment including packaging, as dispatched from the despatching party.

Element.Name: Shipment gross volume
Element.Description: The total volume of the shipment including packaging, as dispatched from the despatching party.

Element.Name: Total number of transport handling units
Element.Description: The total number of transport handling units in this despatch.

Element.Name: Consignment
Element.Description: Information regarding the physical shipment.

Element.Name: Consignment identifier
Element.Description: An association to Consignment covering the shipment. Unique number assigned to goods, both for import and export.

Element.Name: Vehicle information
Element.Description: Description and/or identification of the vehicle that tranpsorts the despatched shipment.

Element.Name: Carrier
Element.Description: Carrier description

Element.Name: Name
Element.Description: Carrier name

Element.Name: Carrier name
Element.Description: The name of the carrier that handles the delivery of the despatched shipment.

Element.Name: Person
Element.Description: Person who performs the physical shipment.

Element.Name: Identification
Element.Description: Identification of the person responsible for the transportation.

Element.Name: Driver information
Element.Description: Identification about the driver of the vehicle that delivers the despatched shipment.

Element.Name: Driver information document type
Element.Description: The type of document used for identifying the driver, expressed in text.

Element.Name: Delivery
Element.Description: Details regarding the shipment.

Element.Name: Delivery tracking identifier
Element.Description: Used to provide a tracking id for delivery e.g. UPS or postal.

Element.Name: Delivery period
Element.Description: Expected delivery period.

Element.Name: Period start date
Element.Description: The start date of the period.

Element.Name: Period start time
Element.Description: The start time of the period.

Element.Name: Period end date
Element.Description: The end date of the period.

Element.Name: Period end time
Element.Description: The end time of the period.

Element.Name: Despatch
Element.Description: Despatch details.

Element.Name: Shipment dispatch date
Element.Description: The actual or expected date when the shipment was despatched from the despatching party.

Element.Name: Shipment dispatch time
Element.Description: The actual or expected time when the shipment was despatched from the despatching party.

Element.Name: Pickup address
Element.Description: Address where the goods is going to be picked up.

Element.Name: Address identifier
Element.Description: Identifier of a specific address in a register of addresses such as GLN.

Element.Name: Address line 1
Element.Description: The main address line in a postal address usually the street name and number.

Element.Name: Address line 2
Element.Description: An additional address line in a postal address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line. Common use are secondary house number in a complex or in a building.

Element.Name: City
Element.Description: The common name of the city where the postal address is. The name is written in full rather than as a code.

Element.Name: Post code
Element.Description: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant national postal service, such as a ZIP code or Post Code.

Element.Name: Country subdivision
Element.Description: For specifying a region, county, state, province etc. within a country by using text.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: The country where the address is. The country should always be given by using ISO code 3166 alpha 2.

Element.Name: Despatch line
Element.Description: The goods contained in the despatch advice.

Element.Name: Despatch line identifier
Element.Description: An identifier for the individual line in the despatch advice.

Element.Name: Despatch line note
Element.Description: General note regarding the despach advice line. Free-form text applying to the Despatch Line. This element may contain notes or any other similar information that is not contained explicitly in another structure..

Element.Name: Delivered quantity
Element.Description: The quantity that is despatched in the line.

Element.Name: Outstanding quantity
Element.Description: The quantity outstanding (which will follow in a later shipment).

Element.Name: Outstanding quantity reason
Element.Description: The reason for the outstanding quantity.

Element.Name: Order line
Element.Description: Reference to the order line the despatch line contains.

Element.Name: Order line reference
Element.Description: To uniquely identify the line of the order that is being despatched.

Element.Name: Item
Element.Description: Item information regarding the goos in the despatch advice line.

Element.Name: Item name
Element.Description: A short name for an item.

Element.Name: Part number
Element.Description: Sellers partnumber.

Element.Name: Item sellers identifier
Element.Description: The sellers identifier for the item.

Element.Name: Item sellers extended identifier
Element.Description: An extended identifier for the item that identifies the item with specific properties, e.g., Item 123 = Chair / Item 123 Ext 45 = brown chair.

Element.Name: Standard partnumber
Element.Description: Identification according to a standard system. i.e. GTIN.

Element.Name: Item standard identifier
Element.Description: An item identifier based on a registered schema.

Element.Name: Item standard extended identifier
Element.Description: with specific properties, e.g., Item 123 = Chair / Item 123 Ext 45 = brown chair.

Element.Name: Hazardous item
Element.Description: Information to be used if the despatch line contains hazardous goods.

Element.Name: Hazardous item UNDG code
Element.Description: The identifier assigned to transportable hazardous goods by the United Nations, expressed as a code.

Element.Name: Haszardous hazard class Identifier
Element.Description: Identifies a hazard class applicable to dangerous goods as defined by the relevant regulation authority, such as the IMDG Class Number of the SOLAS Convention of IMO and the ADR/RID Class Number for the road/rail environment.

Element.Name: Item details
Element.Description: Detailed information regarding the goods on the despatch advice line.

Element.Name: Item manufactured date
Element.Description: The manufacturing date of all items listed in this despatch line.

Element.Name: Item best before date
Element.Description: The best before date of all items listed in this despatch line.

Element.Name: Item serial numbers
Element.Description: Serial numbers for items listed in the despatch line.

Element.Name: LOT
Element.Description: LOT number identification.

Element.Name: Item batch number
Element.Description: The batch number that applies to all items in the despatch line.

Element.Name: Item expiry date
Element.Description: The expiry date of all items listed in this despatch line. The expiry date indicates that the items should not be used after this date.

Element.Name: Packing
Element.Description: Information regarding how the goods in the despach advice line is packed.

Element.Name: Identifier
Element.Description: Shipment identifier is only identified on header level. On line level use “NA”.

Element.Name: Transport handling unit
Element.Description: Information regarding the physical packing (pallet, container, box, etc) of the goods on the despatch advice line.

Element.Name: Handling unit identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the transport handling unit.

Element.Name: Handling unit type
Element.Description: The type of packaging that represent the handling unit, such as box, pallet, container etc.

Element.Name: Handling unit hazardous indicator
Element.Description: Indicates whether the shipment contains hazardous materials.

Element.Name: Handing unit shipping marks
Element.Description: Free-form description of the marks and numbers on a transport unit or package.

Element.Name: Weight/Volume
Element.Description: Information regarding weight/volume of the transport handling unit.

Element.Name: Attribute identifier
Element.Description: Identifier for content in the MEasue element below according to codelist UNCL6313. Use AAB and AAW for gross wieght and gross volume respectively.

Element.Name: Handling unit gross weight/volume
Element.Description: Handling gross weight/volume, including packaging as despatched by despatching party.
